metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5000 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The XLSX2CSV example in Apache POI before 3.14 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted OpenXML document containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> Debian says the vulnerable example isn't packaged

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
